name: ASD Snow Globe Simulator
description:
ASD Snow Globe Simulator

Ever dreamed to make your own custom snow globe? With ASD Snow Globe Simulator you can make it, add any image in it, decide the type and ammount of snowflakes, configure background and let the snow fall or shake it and see the snow tempest in your hands =)

Features

- Add the image you want inside the dome (use images with transparent background for better results), adjust scale and position as you like

- 4 types of snow flakes including white black asd and sakura

- Configure background color for a more pleasant view

- Shake your device to make the tempest in the dome

- Gravity will make the snow flakes pile in a place depending on your phone orientation

- Decide how many snowflakes you want in your dome

- Easy to use and pleasant for your eyes
